Get team schedule results

kp_team_schedule.Rd

Get team schedule results

kp_team_schedule(team, year = 2021)

Arguments

team

Team filter to select.
year

Year of data to pull

Examples

# \donttest{
  kp_team_schedule(team = 'Florida St.', year = 2021)

#>    team_rk        team opponent_rk       opponent    result poss ot pre_wp
